decisions.title: Doc 47 - Infringement - Car 10 - PU elements
decisions.pdfUrl: https://www.fia.com/system/files/decision-document/2025_canadian_grand_prix_-_infringement_-_car_10_-_pu_elements.pdf
decisions.fact: The following Power Unit elements have been used: 3rd Energy Store (ES) 3rd Control Electronics (CE) All Power Unit elements were replaced without the approval of the FIA Technical Delegate during Parc Ferme.
decisions.offence: Breaches of Articles 28.2 and 40.3 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations. Breach of Article 40.9 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations.
decisions.decisionText: Required to start the Race from the pit lane.
decisions.reason: The penalty is imposed in accordance with Article 28.3. The use of each additional element in this case carries a 10 grid place penalty therefore there is an accumulation of 20 places. Article 42.3 d) of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations provides that a driver which has accrued more than 15 cumulative grid position penalties must start from the back of the grid. However, as components were changed without the permission of the FIA Technical Delegate Car 10 must therefore start the race from the pit lane as specified by Art. 40.9 (a).

decisions.title: Doc 46 - Infringement - Car 30 - PU elements and changes made during Parc Ferme
decisions.pdfUrl: https://www.fia.com/system/files/decision-document/2025_canadian_grand_prix_-_infringement_-_car_30_-_pu_elements_and_changes_made_during_parc_ferme.pdf
decisions.competitor: Visa Cash App Racing Bulls F1 Team
decisions.fact: The following Power Unit elements have been used: 5th Internal Combustion Engine (ICE) 5th Turbo Charger (TC) 5th Motor Generator Unit - Heat (MGU-H) 3rd Energy Store (ES) 3rd Control Electronics (CE) All Power Unit elements were replaced without the approval of the FIA Technical Delegate during Parc Ferme. The setup of the suspension has been changed while under Parc Ferme.
decisions.offence: Breaches of Articles 28.2 and 40.3 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations. Breach of Article 40.9 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations.
decisions.decisionText: Required to start the Race from the pit lane.
decisions.reason: The penalty is imposed in accordance with Article 28.3. The use of each additional element in this case carries a 10 grid place penalty therefore there is an accumulation of 50 places. Article 42.3 d) of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations provides that a driver which has accrued more than 15 cumulative grid position penalties must start from the back of the grid. Power Unit elements were changed without the permission of the FIA Technical Delegate. Visa Cash App Racing Bulls F1 Team changed the setup of the suspension of Car 30 under Parc Ferme, this not being in accordance with Article 40.9 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations. As the Power Unit elements were changed without permission and changes have been made to the set-up of the suspension, therefore Car 30 is required to start the Race from pit lane.

decisions.title: Doc 31 - Infringement - Car 22 - Changes made during Parc Ferme
decisions.pdfUrl: https://www.fia.com/system/files/decision-document/2025_spanish_grand_prix_-_infringement_-_car_22_-_changes_made_during_parc_ferme.pdf
decisions.fact: The setup of the suspension has been changed while under Parc Ferme. The front wing specification has been changed while under Parc Ferme.
decisions.offence: Breach of Article 40.9 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations.
decisions.decisionText: Required to start the Race from the pit lane.
decisions.reason: Oracle Red Bull Racing changed the setup of the suspension of Car 22 under Parc Ferme, this not being in accordance with Article 40.9 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations. Car 22 is therefore required to start the Race from pit lane. Oracle Red Bull Racing changed the rear wing specification of Car 22 under Parc Ferme with the approval of the Technical Delegate in accordance with Article 40.3 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations. However, the assembly is of a different specification, which is a breach of Article 40.9 and Car 22 is required to start the Race from pit lane.

decisions.title: Doc 38 - Infringement - Car 22 - PU elements and Parc Ferme
decisions.pdfUrl: https://www.fia.com/system/files/decision-document/2025_emilia_romagna_grand_prix_-_infringement_-_car_22_-_pu_elements_and_parc_ferme.pdf
decisions.fact: The following Power Unit elements have been used: 3rd Energy Store (ES) 3rd Control Electronics (CE) Components of a different specification have been changed whilst under Parc Ferme. All Power Unit elements were replaced with the approval of the FIA Technical Delegate during Parc Ferme.
decisions.offence: Breach of Article 28.2 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations. Breach of Article 40.9 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations.
decisions.decisionText: Required to start the Race from the pit lane.
decisions.reason: The penalty is imposed in accordance with Article 28.3. The use of each additional element in this case carries a 10 grid place penalty therefore there is an accumulation of 20 places. Article 42.3 d) of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations provides that a driver which has accrued more than 15 cumulative grid position penalties must start from the back of the grid. However, as components have also been changed to those of a different specification than used in qualifying Car 22 must therefore start the race from the pit lane as specified by Art. 40.9(a).

decisions.offence: Breach of Article 40.9 b) of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations.
decisions.decisionText: Required to start the Sprint from the pit lane.
decisions.reason: Oracle Red Bull Racing changed the setup of the suspension of Car 22 under Parc Ferme, this not being in accordance with Article 40.9 b) of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations. Car 22 is therefore required to start the Sprint from pit lane.

decisions.fact: The setup of the suspension has been changed while under Parc Ferme.
decisions.offence: Breach of Article 40.9 a) of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations.
decisions.decisionText: Required to start the Race from the pit lane.
decisions.reason: MoneyGram Haas F1 Team changed the setup of the suspension of Car 87 under Parc Ferme, this not being in accordance with Article 40.9 of the FIA Formula One Sporting Regulations. Car 87 is therefore required to start the Race from pit lane.
